name: Thai Chicken Rice Bowl
description: This isn’t your parents’ microwaved dinner! With the help of your Epicure Steamer, those sad TV dinners are a thing of the past. Forget about juggling multiple pots and pans—just put all your ingredients into this one dish and prepare an entire meal right in the microwave!
preparation: Cut chicken into bite sized pieces and place in Round Steamer. Cover; microwave on medium (50% power) 5 min, or until cooked through.
Remove steamer from microwave. Stir in veggies, rice, seasoning, broth, and soy sauce. Microwave uncovered on high 15–16 min, or until liquid has absorbed and rice is tender.
tips: Chicken can be an expensive protein. We’ve used less chicken and suggest adding a hardboiled egg to the finished dish to help stretch your food dollar! Hard boil your eggs on the stovetop, while the dish is in the microwave—easy!
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 hard boiled egg and 1⁄2 cup steamed veggies.
